EndangeredSpecies.title: Cultivating Conservation Champions: Inspiring Action Through Wildlife Education
EndangeredSpecies.summary: Endangered Species International is a nonprofit organization dedicated to spreading awareness about wildlife conservation.  My team and I were given the task to redesign the website to give the user a smoother experience, and did so through improving consistency, reorganizing navigation systems, and removing unnecessary content.  With the slicker design, users are well-educated on the matter of conservation and are motivated to donate to the organization.

MelaninVillage.title: Closing the Equity Gap: Content Optimization to Support Black and Brown Homeschooling
MelaninVillage.summary: The Melanin Village (TMV) is a social-impact organization that provides educational resources, professional development, and a supportive community to encourage Black and Brown families to homeschool.
MelaninVillage.disclaimer: This is only Phase 1 of the project and there will be more in the future.  A previous team has already worked on Phase 0.

ParkMobileLive.title: Smart Parking: Real-Time Availability for a Smoother Commute
ParkMobileLive.summary: ParkMobile LIVE is a redesigned mobile app that offers the same features as the current ParkMobile app, which allows drivers to reserve parking spots and pay for them ahead of time.  Our team noticed that while drivers are able to know what parking garages or parking lots have vacant spots, it can still be difficult finding those specific spots that are vacant.  ParkMobile LIVE offers a solution where drivers can receive live updates on what specific spots are available for any kind of parking area.

WeHelpAndCare.title: Empowering Humanitarian Efforts in Southeast Asia: Product Validation for Impact
WeHelpAndCare.summary: We Help and Care (WHC) is a non-profit charity supporting operations in Southeast Asia, especially in Myanmar, who need urgent humanitarian and development assistance.
WeHelpAndCare.disclaimer: This is only Phase 0 of the project and there will be more in the future.  We will be setting up a research foundation for future phases.
